Uses of Interface
com.interface21.beans.factory.ListableBeanFactory

Packages that use ListableBeanFactory
com.interface21.beans.factory.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.beans.factory package.  
com.interface21.beans.factory.xml Contains an abstract XML-based BeanFactory implementation, including a standard "spring-beans" DTD.  
com.interface21.context This package builds on the beans package to add support for message sources and for the Observer design pattern, and the ability for application objects to obtain resources using a consistent API.  
com.interface21.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.context package, such as abstract base classes for ApplicationContext implementations and a MessageSource implementation. 
com.interface21.ejb.support Superclasses to make implementing EJBs simpler and less error-prone.  
com.interface21.jdbc.core.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.jdbc.core package.  
com.interface21.ui.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.ui.context package.  
com.interface21.web.context Contains the application context subinterface for web applications, and the ContextLoaderListener that bootstraps the root web application context. 
com.interface21.web.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.web.context package, such as WebApplicationContext implementations, and a utility class for retrieval of the root application context etc. 
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.beans.factory.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.beans.factory.support that implement ListableBeanFactory
 class ListableBeanFactoryImpl
          Concrete implementation of ListableBeanFactory.
 class StaticListableBeanFactory
          Singleton only.
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.beans.factory.xml
 

Classes in com.interface21.beans.factory.xml that implement ListableBeanFactory
 class XmlBeanFactory
          Extension of ListableBeanFactoryImpl that reads bean definitions in an XML document using DOM.
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.context
 

Subinterfaces of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.context
 interface ApplicationContext
          Interface to provide configuration for an application.
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.context.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.context.support that implement ListableBeanFactory
 class AbstractApplicationContext
          Partial implementation of ApplicationContext.
 class AbstractXmlApplicationContext
          Convenient abstract superclass for ApplicationContext implementations drawing their configuration from XML documents containing bean definitions understood by an XMLBeanFactory
 class ClassPathXmlApplicationContext
          Standalone XML application context, taking the context definition files from the classpath.
 class FileSystemXmlApplicationContext
          Standalone XML application context, taking the context definition files from the file system or from URLs.
 class StaticApplicationContext
          ApplicationContext to allow concrete registration of Java objects in code, rather than from external configuration sources.
 

Methods in com.interface21.context.support that return ListableBeanFactory
protected abstract  ListableBeanFactory AbstractApplicationContext.getBeanFactory()
          Unimplemented interface method.
 ListableBeanFactory AbstractXmlApplicationContext.getBeanFactory()
          Return the default BeanFactory for this context
protected  ListableBeanFactory StaticApplicationContext.getBeanFactory()
           
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.ejb.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.ejb.support that implement ListableBeanFactory
 class JndiEnvironmentBeanFactory
          BeanFactory implementation populated by JNDI environment variables available to an object running in a J2EE application server.
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.jdbc.core.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.jdbc.core.support that implement ListableBeanFactory
 class JdbcBeanFactory
          ListableBeanFactory implementation that reads values from a database table.

          Adds theme capabilities for UI contexts.
 class StaticUiApplicationContext
          Adds theme capabilities for UI contexts.
 

Uses of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.web.context
 

Subinterfaces of ListableBeanFactory in com.interface21.web.context
 interface WebApplicationContext
          Interface to provide configuration for a web application.

Classes in com.interface21.web.context.support that implement ListableBeanFactory

          WebApplicationContext implementation for testing.

          WebApplicationContext implementation that takes configuration from an XML document.
